posts.content:
hi

just had my bus trimmed out by dave at spirit interiors having seen his work at Stanford hall we decided to go with him

nothing was too much trouble and has done an excellent job on all the upholstery work and he put in a new headlining wow as factory fitted

and as a real bonus he did exactly as we asked with panel detail and piping etc and we delivered it as agreed and was finished on time
over three weeks and at a very good price

his contact details are 01675 479775 or their website spirit interiors based in a small one vehicle workshop north east Birmingham

fully recommend

mike
I have heard good things about them, any photos by chance to show off the new interior?
